title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 107.2 - Certification of supervised hours in driver education courses pursuant to education law, section 806-a(2)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 107.2 - Certification of supervised hours in driver education courses pursuant to education law, section 806-a(2)

State Regulations

The driver education teacher in a driver and traffic safety
education course approved by the commissioner shall, upon the request of his or
her student who is the holder of a class DJ or class MJ learner's permit, certify on a form prescribed by the Commissioner of Motor Vehicles the number
of hours such student has spent operating a motor vehicle while under the
immediate supervision of such driver education teacher. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
107.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
